pr_title: Fixes related to Maven projects using the 'revision' property as the project version

timeline.bodyText: Just a heads up: https://maven.apache.org/maven-ci-friendly.html does not only support revision but also sha1 and/or changelist.
timeline.author: famod

replies.bodyText: Thanks for pointing this out. I'll probably add support for those in another PR just to get this one in quicker. Unless you tell me you absolutely need them :)
replies.author: aloubyansky

timeline.bodyText:
Does this also cover -Drevision=<something_different_than_in_pom>?
This is important, because that is what CI (e.g. Jenkins via Jenkinsfile) would be passing to mvn to override the default revision.
A variation is of that would be:


<properties>
    <revision>0.1-${revisionSuffix}</revision>
    <revisionSuffix>SNAPSHOT</revisionSuffix>
</properties>

CI passes -DrevisionSuffix=build-${BUILD_NUMBER}

This way local build produces 0.1-SNAPSHOT and CI produces something like 0.1-build-123.

Which part do you mean? -Drevision=... is mentioned explicitly multiple times.
The revisionSuffix is not mentioned but IMHO this is just basic Maven interpolation logic, no?

I just tried the following and everything works as expected (in Maven itself):
diff --git a/core/pom.xml b/core/pom.xml
index ea45976..b52f070 100644
--- a/core/pom.xml
+++ b/core/pom.xml
@@ -5,7 +5,7 @@
   <parent>
     <groupId>com.github.famod.modmono-quarkus</groupId>
     <artifactId>modmono-quarkus-parent</artifactId>
-    <version>${revision}</version>
+    <version>${revision}${sha1}</version>
   </parent>
   <artifactId>modmono-quarkus-core</artifactId>
   <dependencies>
diff --git a/dist/pom.xml b/dist/pom.xml
index 278e9c5..e0df457 100644
--- a/dist/pom.xml
+++ b/dist/pom.xml
@@ -5,7 +5,7 @@
   <parent>
     <groupId>com.github.famod.modmono-quarkus</groupId>
     <artifactId>modmono-quarkus-parent</artifactId>
-    <version>${revision}</version>
+    <version>${revision}${sha1}</version>
   </parent>
   <artifactId>modmono-quarkus-dist</artifactId>
   <dependencies>
diff --git a/pom.xml b/pom.xml
index b895c66..f72103c 100644
--- a/pom.xml
+++ b/pom.xml
@@ -4,10 +4,11 @@
   <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
   <groupId>com.github.famod.modmono-quarkus</groupId>
   <artifactId>modmono-quarkus-parent</artifactId>
-  <version>${revision}</version>
+  <version>${revision}${sha1}</version>
   <packaging>pom</packaging>
   <properties>
-    <revision>1.0-SNAPSHOT</revision>
+    <revision>0.3</revision>
+    <sha1>-SNAPSHOT</sha1>

     <compiler-plugin.version>3.8.1</compiler-plugin.version>
